titles.title: Providing for consideration of motions to suspend the rules.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-465, by Mr. Dreier.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 157.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 374.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 214 - 202 (Roll no. 590).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 11/10/1999--Introduced. Makes it in order at any time on or before November 17, 1999, for the Speaker of the House of Representatives to entertain motions that the House suspend the rules.
